about_the_game:
🏰🐉 A New 4X FTS Strategy Game! 🐉🏰

Embark on a new adventure as you have been invited to join the *Open Beta* of Magic And Dragon - a 4X strategy game set in a fantasy universe! Be part of the development journey and help shape the game with your valuable feedback.

🔮 Tailored for touchscreen devices but still enjoyable with traditional controls:
Enjoy simplified gameplay mechanics (maybe even too much?) and UI, focusing on quicker fun.

🐲 Delve into a World of Fantasy Encounters:
Immerse yourself in a realm of monsters, demons, and dragons, where encounters await.

⚔️ Master the Art of Tactical Warfare:
Assemble a formidable army with an extensive variety of units, each boasting unique abilities and spellcasting prowess. Engage in epic battles, where tactical brilliance is the key to victory!

🗺️ Explore a Vast and Diverse Map:
Dive into a realm of endless possibilities, offering a rich tapestry of strategies and counters. With a plethora of choices and diverse maps, every game promises a fresh and thrilling experience.

😄 A Dash of Humor:
Prepare for a smile or two. Or maybe less.

💎 No Pay-to-Win, No Ads:
Like the good old times.

🎉 Join the Open Beta Now
Download now and set forth on an adventure filled with conquest, magic, and camaraderie. The fate of this game lies in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Touchscreen preferred, Keyboard and mouse supported.

short_description: Turn-based strategy game in a world filled with magics, demons and dragons! Build, expand, conquer, form alliances and wage wars.
